narratives.narrative_name: CC: Criticism of institutions and authorities
narratives.evidence_quote: A extensão dos danos geológicos hoje em dia é quase impossível de medir, e quase nada foi feito pela empresa para tentar reparar os danos causados.
narratives.reasoning: This passage criticizes the company (an institution/authority) for negligence and failure to repair damages, fitting the narrative of criticizing institutions and authorities.

narratives.narrative_name: CC: Hidden plots by secret schemes of powerful groups
narratives.evidence_quote: Trata-se de um ato criminoso de greenwashing.
narratives.reasoning: This line implies a deliberate, deceptive strategy by powerful actors to present a false environmental commitment, aligning with the hidden plots narrative.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: CC: Criticism of institutions and authorities: Criticism of international entities
subnarratives.evidence_quote: A COP28, que decorre no Dubai, denuncia o aquecimento global e a dependência dos combustíveis fósseis. Mas, muitas empresas que participam no evento, fazem parte do grupo dos maiores financiadores de petróleo do mundo.
subnarratives.reasoning: The sentence frames COP28 as an international body whose integrity is undermined by the presence of fossil-fuel financiers among its participants, illustrating criticism of international entities' role in climate policy.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: CC: Hidden plots by secret schemes of powerful groups: Climate agenda has hidden motives
subnarratives.evidence_quote: A presença da Braskem na COP28 – tal como a presença de várias outras empresas que promovem o desmando exploratório — não configura apenas hipocrisia: é uma estratégia bem pensada para articular um falso compromisso com práticas ambientalmente sustentáveis.
subnarratives.reasoning: The text frames the COP28 participation as a calculated move to present a false commitment to environmental practices, indicating hidden motives and greenwashing behind climate actions (profit/agenda beyond genuine sustainability).
